sections.title: Protection that stays in place when you play
sections.body: We create custom sports mouthguards in partnership with specialist dental laboratories. Thickness and coverage are selected to suit your sport, letting you breathe and communicate while keeping teeth and cheeks protected.
bullets: Impressions or scans capture your bite for an exact fit
Trim lines refined for comfort and stability

sections.title: From impressions to match-ready fit
items: Consultation to discuss sport, position, and previous injuries
Impressions or scans to capture teeth and bite
Lab fabrication with tailored thickness and layering
Fit appointment with comfort and retention checks
Advice on wear-in, storage, and when to replace
sections.strapline: We keep digital records where possible so replacements are simpler when seasons change.

sections.title: Look after your sports guard
items: Rinse after use and clean with mild solutions to prevent odour
Store in a ventilated case away from heat and sunlight
Check for tears or thinning and arrange replacements before protection is reduced
Bring the guard to dental reviews for fit checks

faqs.question: Can you make guards for children?
faqs.answer: Yes. We tailor designs to growing mouths and advise when replacements are sensible as teeth move or erupt.

faqs.question: How often should I replace my guard?
faqs.answer: Replacement intervals depend on wear and growth. We review your guard at check-ups and plan updates before protection drops.

faqs.question: Are these suitable over braces?
faqs.answer: We design lab-made guards to accommodate brackets or aligners, balancing coverage with space to avoid unwanted pressure.
